sentence.Network_en: At this all his selfrestraint went to the winds.
sentence.Network_cn: 听到这之后,他完全失去了自制.

entry.def: If you show self-restraint, you do not do something even though you would like to do it, because you think it would be better not to.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
